content.raw:
I tried out the setup explained, however when I tried the new launch file with a T or X configuration, it first says: 

`IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: u'/home/raymond/vmrc_ws/src/vmrc/wamv_gazebo/urdf/wamv_gazebo_t.urdf'`

Which is caused because the files in this setup are xacro files so its name instead is: wamv\_gazebo\_t.urdf .xacro

So i just renamed the file to wamv\_gazebo\_t.urdf \(I know that doesn’t convert xacro to urdf, but I tried anyway\) and the simulation runs but the model of the WAMV is not loaded. 

Then I tried converting the xacro to urdf using the command: 

`rosrun xacro xacro --inorder -o wamv_gazebo_t.urdf wamv_gazebo_t.urdf.xacro`

but I run into the error:

`No such file or directory: /home/raymond/vmrc_ws/src/vmrc/wamv_description/urdf/wamv_t_thrusters.urdf.xacro None None`

Any help or insight would be appreciated.
content.html:
I tried out the setup explained, however when I tried the new launch file with a T or X configuration, it first says:

IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: u'/home/raymond/vmrc_ws/src/vmrc/wamv_gazebo/urdf/wamv_gazebo_t.urdf'

Which is caused because the files in this setup are xacro files so its name instead is: wamv_gazebo_t.urdf .xacro

So i just renamed the file to wamv_gazebo_t.urdf (I know that doesn’t convert xacro to urdf, but I tried anyway) and the simulation runs but the model of the WAMV is not loaded.

Then I tried converting the xacro to urdf using the command:

rosrun xacro xacro --inorder -o wamv_gazebo_t.urdf wamv_gazebo_t.urdf.xacro

but I run into the error:

No such file or directory: /home/raymond/vmrc_ws/src/vmrc/wamv_description/urdf/wamv_t_thrusters.urdf.xacro None None

Any help or insight would be appreciated.
